title: FSIB shortlists five for executive director positions
description: FSIB shortlisted five CGMs for ED positions in public sector banks after interviewing 57 candidates. Vaheed, Rajeeva, and Majumdar are top three in the list, while Surendran and Srivastava are number four and five.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
